title: Karil's leathertop (Last Man Standing)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Karil's leathertop from Last Man Standing is a minigame-exclusive variant of the normal Karil's leathertop. It is the strongest piece of ranged armour worn in the body slot inside Last Man Standing. It can be obtained from opening the chests with a bloody key or bloodier key, or looting the crates that spawn at random locations on the map. It can be looted from other players as it always drops on death.

Item ID23632

Karil's leathertop from Last Man Standing is a minigame-exclusive variant of the normal Karil's leathertop. It is the strongest piece of ranged armour worn in the body slot inside Last Man Standing. It can be obtained from opening the chests with a bloody key or bloodier key, or looting the crates that spawn at random locations on the map. It can be looted from other players as it always drops on death.

[[File:Karil's leathertop (Last Man Standing) detail.png|left|120px]]
'''Karil's leathertop''' from [[Last Man Standing]] is a minigame-exclusive variant of the normal [[Karil's leathertop]]. It is the strongest piece of [[ranged armour]] worn in the [[body slot]] inside [[Last Man Standing]]. It can be obtained from opening the chests with a [[bloody key]] or [[bloodier key]], or looting the crates that spawn at random locations on the map. It can be looted from other players as it always drops on death.
